name: Phase Distorter Disorder
description:
You’ve been working feverishly on your time machine, but on your last bootup attempt… BOOOM.. It shot out a violent explosion of temporal energy! (a bit of shrapnel too!) Now you find yourself stuck in an endlessly repeating loop, desperately trying to cobble together 5 crucial replacement parts from around your lab. You have a strange feeling… You might’ve lost something else…

Controls: movement

WASD / ← → ↑ ↓

interact

Spacebar / Enter

drop item

Q / 0
